response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,200,000. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $1,150,000. This exclusive offer is designed to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return for my investment. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product and offers you a chance to secure it at a premium yet reasonable cost. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1150000}
